title: Why do People Cooperate with the Police and Criminal Courts?   A Test of Procedural Justice Theory in 30 Countries
description: This paper presents a cross-national test of the portability of procedural justice theory. Analysis of sample survey data from 30 diverse social, political and legal contexts across Europe and beyond finds qualified support for the theory across national borders.
